name: Mattext
body:
Mattext shows text with different animations (including matrix-style rain-of-symbols) during page changes.

[![Video](http://img.youtube.com/vi/EuGp7daniX0/0.jpg)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EuGp7daniX0)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
